heroInfo.description: Analytical data expert transforming raw data into actionable insights. I optimize decision-making with data visualization & predictive analytics. Let's turn data into powerful strategies.

listOfAchievements.text: Received the Best Research Paper Award for significant contributions to artificial intelligence applications in education, with the research published in a renowned international journal.
Successfully completed the Stanford University Machine Learning Certification, gaining expertise in supervised and unsupervised learning, deep learning, and AI-driven decision-making.
Invited as a keynote speaker at the National Education Summit, where I delivered a session on the impact of AI and big data in modern educational methodologies.
Honored with the Distinguished Professor Award by a prestigious university in recognition of excellence in research, teaching, and academic leadership.
Mentored over 50 Ph.D. and Masterâ€™s students, guiding research scholars in various domains including artificial intelligence, cybersecurity, and blockchain applications.

projects.headline1: Led AI-driven Analytics for E-commerce Growth.
projects.headline2: Built AI-powered customer recommendation systems, improving conversion rates by 18%. Developed real-time fraud detection algorithms using machine learning and NLP, reducing fraud cases by 35%. Optimized supply chain forecasting models, cutting logistics costs by 20%.
projects.skills: Big Data, AWS, Python, Deep Learning, NLP

projects.headline2: Developed large-scale data models to improve ad targeting, boosting revenue by 25%. Led a team to build automated data pipelines reducing manual work by 40%. Spearheaded AI-driven sentiment analysis to enhance customer experience.
projects.skills: AI/ML, Google Cloud, Advanced Data Science, Business Intelligence

projects.headline1: Led Data Engineering and Predictive Analytics.
projects.headline2: Designed ETL pipelines and integrated multi-source data for real-time analytics. Built machine learning models for customer segmentation, increasing engagement by 20%. Developed automated anomaly detection systems, improving fraud detection accuracy by 30%.
projects.skills: Business Intelligence, Data Engineering, Python, Machine Learning

projects.headline2: Developed automated dashboards in Tableau and Power BI, reducing reporting time by 50%. Optimized SQL queries for large datasets, improving query efficiency by 40%. Implemented predictive analytics models for sales forecasting, increasing revenue accuracy by 15%.

qualifications.courseName: Bachelor of Science in Data Science & Analytics
qualifications.headline1: Specialized in Data Science and Statistical Modeling.
qualifications.headline2: Won 1st Prize in a National-Level Data Analytics Competition.
